name: Teomim Island
description:
Teomim Island Is a Short Singleplayer Experience, You will need to explore the island to progress, The environment is dark and a big part of the island is its forest walking there at night time is dangerous this is why you are a trained professional, Loot is found all around the island collect as much supplies as you can because you're not alone, There are many wolves that inhabit the island you will need to protect yourself from them by using firearms found all over the island, As you go along you will find yourself fighting wolves and some other creatures and you will get injured, But don't worry you will find plenty of Medkits, Armored Vests and Painkillers to patch yourself up.
As you progress you will find some mysteries that you will have to solve by collecting particular items or killing.





Interaction:
As you explore the island you will find things you can interact with such as Loot, Doors, Buttons, Levers.
When getting close to an interactable an indicator will appear.


Combat:
If you played FPS games you will find yourself very familiar with the movement and key input.
You Are Able To ADS "Aim Down Sights" with every firearm, You can throw grenades and
Quick equip different weapons by pressing "1" or "2".
You Can Crouch to avoid some of the weapon recoil.
And Don't forget to use your flashlight.


Inventory / Loot:
Your Inventory is very important there are 2 ways to open your inventory one by pressing "I" and second way by pressing the "TAB" button.
Once your inventory window is open you have full control you can move the inventory window where ever you like on your screen.
Loot that you picked up will show inside your inventory window, By clicking right mouse button on one of the items a sub action window
will open up, Letting you choose what to do with the item, Some Items are important and you will not be able to remove or even see them in your inventory.
